textBeforeTable: Salaries September 29, 1999: Signed as a free agent with the Los Angeles Lakers. January 21, 1999: Released by the Chicago Bulls. March 24, 1996: Signed as a free agent with the Chicago Bulls. March 4, 1996: Signed the first of two 10-day contracts with the Chicago Bulls. February 2, 1996: Waived by the Toronto Raptors. June 24, 1995: Drafted by the Toronto Raptors from the Miami Heat in the NBA expansion draft. September 8, 1992: Traded by the Detroit Pistons to the Miami Heat for Isaiah Morris and a 1993 1st round draft pick (Lindsey Hunter was later selected). June 17, 1986: Drafted by the Detroit Pistons in the 1st round (11th pick) of the 1986 NBA Draft. November 18, 1985: Sent to the Detroit Pistons (as a future 1986 1st round draft pick) with a 1987 2nd round draft pick (Rickie Winslow was later selected) as compensation for the Sacramento Kings signing Terry Tyler and a 1986 1st round draft pick (Harold Pressley was later selected) as a veteran free agent. Detroit had the option to swap 1st
